description: Lists the action groups for an agent and information about each one.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the agent.

nested_items.name: actionGroupSummaries
nested_items.description: A list of objects, each of which contains information about an action group.

nested_items.name: actionGroupId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the action group.

nested_items.name: actionGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the action group.

nested_items.name: actionGroupState
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the action group is available for the agent to invoke or not when sending an InvokeAgent request.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the action group.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the action group was last updated.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If the total number of results is greater than the maxResults value provided in the request, use this token when making another request in the nextToken field to return the next batch of results.
